histogram.name: DataSharing.Android.JoinActionFlowState
histogram.summary: Records the state of the join flow. Records one enum value for progress on each step of the flow. This histogram is used to understand the drop off rates at each step, and to estimate the frequency of errors.

histogram.name: DataSharing.Android.ShareActionFlowState
histogram.summary: Records the state of the share flow. Records one enum value for progress on each step of the flow. This histogram is used to understand the drop off rates at each step, and to estimate the frequency of errors.

histogram.name: DataSharing.Android.{FlowName}.{FlowStep}.Latency
histogram.summary: Records the duration of {FlowStep} during {FlowName}. This histogram is used to measure the latency of each step of the Data Sharing process.
